title: How to enable the screen-unlocking pattern?
answer:
1 Click Settings > Security > Screen lock > Pattern. 

2 In the "choose your pattern " interface, use your finger to sweep over the center of several circles to set the graphic style to be used to unlock, and then click "Continue". 

3 Sweep over the screen in the above manner again, and click "OK" to complete the setting of the unlocking pattern. 

4When clicking the power button or switching on/off the phone, the phone will enter into the pattern unlocking interface by default, and sweep over the screen in the above manner to unlock. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110068) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110069)
